segments.text: I have him this semester . What do you think about him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's a terrible instructor and demands a lot , but fortunately , he's an easy grader .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you end up getting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got an A - . Sounds good , but none of my test scores were that high , so I don't know how I got a decent grade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's probably because he grades on a curve .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you enjoying the class so far ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate it and I was about to withdrawal . But after hearing your experience , I think I will tough it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Definitely stay in the class . You will get a better grade than your test scores . He does that deliberately to make all the students study a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for letting me know . I feel relieved now .
segments.speaker: S1
